verses.verse: For <WG1063> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like<WG3664> unto a man<WG444> that was a householder<WG3617>, who<WG3748> went out<WG1831> early<WG260> in the morning<WG4404> to hire<WG3409> laborers<WG2040> into<WG1519> his<WG846> vineyard<WG290>.
And <WG1161> when he had agreed<WG4856> with<WG3326> the laborers<WG2040> for<WG1537> a shilling<WG1220> a day<WG2250>, he sent<WG649> them<WG846> into<WG1519> his<WG846> vineyard<WG290>.
And <WG2532> he went out<WG1831> about<WG4012> the<WG5610> third<WG5154> hour<WG5610>, and saw<WG1492> others<WG243> standing<WG2476> in<WG1722> the marketplace<WG58> idle<WG692>;

and <WG2548> to them<WG2036> he said<WG5217>, Go ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> into<WG1519> the vineyard<WG290>, and<WG2532> whatsoever<WG3739> is<WG5600> right<WG1342> I will give<WG1325> you<WG5213>. And<WG1161> they went their way<WG565>.
Again <WG3825> he went out<WG1831> about<WG4012> the<WG5610> sixth<WG1623> and<WG2532> the ninth<WG1766> hour<WG5610>, and did<WG4160> likewise<WG5615>.

And <WG1161> about<WG4012> the<WG5610> eleventh<WG1734> hour<WG5610> he went out<WG1831>, and<WG2532> found<WG2147> others<WG243> standing<WG2476>; and<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> stand ye<WG2476> here<WG5602> all<WG3650> the day<WG2250> idle<WG692>?
They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Because<WG3754> no man<WG3762> hath hired<WG3409> us<WG2248>. He saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Go<WG5217> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> into<WG1519> the vineyard<WG290>.

And <WG1161> when<WG1096> even<WG3798> was come<WG1096>, the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> saith<WG3004> unto<WG2012> his<WG846> steward<WG2012>, Call<WG2564> the laborers<WG2040>, and<WG2532> pay<WG591> them<WG846> their hire<WG3408>, beginning<WG756> from<WG575> the last<WG2078> unto<WG2193> the first<WG4413>.
And <WG2532> when they came<WG2064> that<WG3588> were hired about<WG4012> the<WG5610> eleventh<WG1734> hour<WG5610>, they received<WG2983> every man<WG303> a shilling<WG1220>.

And <WG1161> when<WG2064> the first<WG4413> came<WG2064>, they supposed<WG3543> that<WG3754> they would receive<WG2983> more<WG4119>; and<WG2532> they<WG846> likewise<WG2532> received<WG2983> every man<WG303> a shilling<WG1220>.
And <WG1161> when they received<WG2983> it<WG1111>, they murmured against<WG2596> the householder<WG3617>,

saying <WG3754>, These<WG3778> last<WG2078> have spent<WG4160> but one<WG1520> hour<WG5610>, and<WG2532> thou hast made<WG4160> them<WG846> equal<WG2470> unto us<WG2254>, who have borne<WG941> the burden<WG922> of the day<WG2250> and<WG2532> the scorching heat<WG2742>.

But <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to one<WG1520> of them<WG846>, Friend<WG2083>, I do<WG91> thee<WG4571> no<WG3756> wrong<WG91>: didst<WG4856> not<WG3756> thou agree<WG4856> with me<WG3427> for a shilling<WG1220>?

Take <WG142> up that which is thine<WG4674>, and<WG2532> go thy way<WG5217>; it is my will<WG2309> to<WG1161> give<WG1325> unto<WG2078> this<WG5129> last<WG2078>, even<WG2532> as<WG5613> unto thee<WG4671>.

Is it<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> for me<WG3427> to do<WG4160> what<WG3739> I will<WG2309> with<WG1722> mine own<WG1487>? or is<WG2076> thine<WG4675> eye<WG3788> evil<WG4190>, because<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> good<WG18>?
So <WG3779> the last<WG2078> shall be<WG2071> first<WG4413>, and<WG2532> the first<WG4413> last<WG2078>.

And <WG2532> as Jesus<WG2424> was going up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>, he took<WG3880> the twelve<WG1427> disciples<WG3101> apart<WG2398>, and<WG2532> on the way<WG3598> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>,

Behold <WG2400>, we go up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>; and<WG2532> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall be delivered<WG3860> unto the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122>; and<WG2532> they shall condemn<WG2632> him<WG846> to death<WG2288>,

and <WG2532> shall deliver<WG3860> him<WG846> unto the Gentiles<WG1484> to<WG1519> mock<WG1702>, and<WG2532> to scourge<WG3146>, and<WG2532> to crucify<WG4717>: and<WG2532> the<WG2250> third<WG5154> day<WG2250> he shall be raised up<WG450>.

Then <WG5119> came<WG4334> to him<WG846> the mother<WG3384> of<WG5207> the sons<WG5207> of Zebedee<WG2199> with<WG3326> her<WG846> sons<WG5207>, worshipping<WG4352> him<WG2532>, and asking<WG154> a certain thing<WG5100> of<WG3844> him<WG846>.

And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto her<WG846>, What<WG5101> wouldest thou<WG2309>? She saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Command<WG2036> that<WG2443> these<WG3778> my<WG3450> two<WG1417> sons<WG5207> may sit<WG2523>, one<WG1520> on<WG1537> thy<WG4675> right hand<WG1188>, and<WG2532> one<WG1520> on<WG1537> thy left<WG2176> hand<WG1722>, in thy<WG4675> kingdom<WG932>.

But <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, Ye know<WG1492> not<WG3756> what<WG5101> ye ask<WG154>. Are ye able<WG1410> to drink<WG4095> the cup<WG4221> that<WG3739> I<WG1473> am<WG3195> about to drink<WG4095>? They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, We are able<WG1410>.

He <WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, My<WG3450> cup<WG4221> indeed<WG3303> ye shall drink<WG4095>: but<WG1161> to sit<WG2523> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188>, and<WG2532> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> left<WG2176> hand<WG1473>, is not<WG3756> mine<WG3450> to give<WG1325>; but<WG1161> it is<WG2076> for them for whom<WG3739> it hath been prepared<WG2090> of<WG5259> my<WG1699> Father<WG3962>.
And <WG2532> when<WG191> the ten<WG1176> heard<WG191> it<WG23>, they were moved with indignation concerning<WG4012> the two<WG1417> brethren<WG80>.

But <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> them<WG846> unto him<WG2036>, and said, Ye know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the rulers<WG758> of the Gentiles<WG1484> lord it over<WG2634> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> their great<WG3173> ones exercise authority over<WG2715> them<WG846>.

Not <WG3756> so<WG3779> shall<WG2071> it be<WG2071> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>: but<WG235> whosoever<WG3739> would become<WG2309> great<WG3173> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> shall be<WG2309> your<WG5213> minister<WG1249>;
and <WG2532> whosoever<WG3739> would<WG2309> be<WG1511> first<WG4413> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> shall be<WG1511> your<WG5213> servant<WG1401>:

even as<WG5618> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> came<WG2064> not<WG3756> to be ministered unto<WG1247>, but<WG235> to minister<WG1247>, and<WG2532> to give<WG1325> his<WG846> life<WG5590> a ransom<WG3083> for<WG473> many<WG4183>.
And <WG2532> as<WG1607> they<WG846> went<WG1607> out<WG575> from<WG575> Jericho<WG2410>, a<WG3793> great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793> followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> behold<WG2400>, two<WG1417> blind men<WG5185> sitting<WG2521> by<WG3844> the way side<WG3598>, when they heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> was passing by<WG3855>, cried out<WG2896>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, have mercy on<WG1653> us<WG2248>, thou son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>.

And <WG1161> the multitude<WG3793> rebuked<WG2008> them<WG846>, that<WG2443> they should hold their peace<WG4623>: but<WG1161> they cried<WG2896> out the more<WG3185>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, have mercy on<WG1653> us<WG2248>, thou son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>.
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> stood still<WG2476>, and called<WG5455> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, What<WG5101> will ye<WG2309> that I should do<WG4160> unto you<WG5213>?
They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Lord<WG2962>, that<WG2443> our<WG2257> eyes<WG3788> may be opened<WG455>.

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424>, being moved with compassion<WG4697>, touched<WG680> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788>; and<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> they received their<WG846> sight<WG308>, and<WG2532> followed<WG190> him<WG846>.
